extraDescription: The Integrity Services Branch (ISB) has developed a DRAFT of a branch-wide vision and mission to shape its future direction in light of the transformation and modernization agenda of the Government of Canada. The contracting firm will facilitate additional sessions with senior management team to finalize the vision and the mission statements which will help senior management convey to staff and stakeholders the future direction of the Branch and the overall Integrity Business line. The mission statement will help the management convey a more cohesive picture to staff and to stakeholders on the overall business of the Branch, rather than a grouping of distinct business lines.
